doc.title: Results of the Culinary Course Competition
doc.text: Thanks/JJ to/TO all/DT who/WP have/VBN written/VBN in/IN to/TO join/VB the/DT competition/NN !/. You/PRP all/RB wrote/VBD very/RB well/RB ,/, but/CC as/IN you/PRP know/VBP there/RB can/MD only/RB be/VB one/CD winning/NN entry/NN ./. But/CC do/VBP n't/RB be/VB disheartened/NN ,/, I/PRP hope/VBD that/IN we/PRP can/MD run/VB more/RB similar/JJ competitions/NN in/IN the/DT future/NN ./. So/RB without/IN further/JJ ado/NN ,/, I/PRP am/VBP happy/JJ to/TO announce/VB that/IN the/DT 2/CD people/NNS who/WP will/MD be/VB attending/VBD the/DT Gourmet/JJ Culinary/NN Course/IN this/DT Friday/NN and/CC Saturday/NNS are/VBP :/: Congrats/NNP !/. And/CC make/VB sure/VB you/PRP invite/VB us/PRP to/TO your/PRP$ home/NN later/NN to/TO try/VB your/PRP$ newfound/NNP skills/NNP !/. Some/DT stuff/NN to/TO note/VB :/:
